channel.title: SOOCTF on fliqqs

item.title: hat generator
item.description: Hat Generator Link to heading This was a fun pwn challenge where I learnt alot and was able to improve my pwn skills. We were given a application that asks for your hat size and then attempts to pick out a hat for you. Lets have a poke around. We know the gets is dangerous and me think of bufferover flows. But what to do? Looking around in Ghidra there may be a function of interest.
